message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one taking the risk of negotiating!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still the one getting the better deal
You're not getting away with the better deal this time, I'm making a bold move!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much
I'm not afraid to take a risk, I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the lion's share!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to give up completely
